EmailTemplate.name: Texas Turbines.Reminder_Oshkosh_Lunch N' Learn.Oshkosh Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited to the TPE331 Engine Lunch N' Learn
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Evolution of the TPE331 Engine Lunch N' Learn Session Date
July 28th, 2016 Time
12pm-1pm Location
Bendix King Pavilion Join Texas Turbines and Honeywell at Oshkosh 2016 on July 28th as we showcase the world’s most powerful and efficient turboprop engine, the TPE331. Get up close and see for yourself why the TPE331 continues to be the most highly recommended turboprop engine on the market today. RSVP to save your spot to the “Evolution of the TPE331” at booth # ___ to learn more about the history and revolution of the TPE331 and get your TPE331 50th Anniversary T-shirt. “Garrett Grown, Honeywell Honed. REGISTER HERE <[[#]]> © 2016 Honeywell International Inc. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellNow/]]> <[[http://twitter.com/honeywellaidc]]> <[[http://www.youtube.com/honeywellaidc]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-scanning-&-mobility?trk=hb_tab_compy_id_2921697]]> This message was sent to name@website.com.
